parameters.name: CertificateId
parameters.description:
The list of certificate IDs.

You can query the association between at most 20 SSL certificates and VPN gateways.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **1** to **20**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. Valid values:

*   You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request.
*   You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of **NextToken**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the VPN gateway.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: VpnGatewayId
parameters.description:
The list of VPN gateway IDs.

You can query the association between at most 20 VPN gateways and SSL certificates.
